quote_last: Trause handed her his ATM card and instructed her to go to the neighborhood Citibank near Sheridan Square and transfer forty thousand dollars from his savings account to his checking account.
title: Oracle Night
author: Paul Auster

quote_last: Whoever is righteous has regard for the life of his beast, but the mercy of the wicked is cruel.
title: Proverbs
author: ESV

quote_last: For they disciplined us for a short time as it seemed best to them, but he disciplines us for our good, that we may share his holiness.
title: Hebrews
author: ESV
